title: Flat Shade via c# or python?
question:

How to control Flat Shade in Grasshopper using c# or python?

# doc expected to be a RhinoDoc

code_blocks.code:
import Rhino

doc = Rhino.RhinoDoc.ActiveDoc
rs = doc.RenderSettings
rs.FlatShade = True
doc.RenderSettings = rs

doc.Views.Redraw()

code_blocks.code:
import Rhino as rh
import Grasshopper as gh

if run:
     gh.Plugin.GH_PluginUtil.SendKeyCodeToRhino("_FlatShade _Enter")
     rh.RhinoApp.SetCommandPrompt("")
rh.RhinoDoc.ActiveDoc.Views.Redraw()
